Usage
=====

Installation
------------

To use pyoxynet, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install pyoxynet


Functions
---------

To test the package you can use the ``PrintHello()`` function:

.. autofunction:: PrintHello()

The optimal filter adopted for the project ``optimal_filter(t, y, my_lambda)`` function:

.. autofunction:: optimal_filter(t, y, my_lambda)
